00026 namespace Hypertable { namespace Config {

00028 void init_thrift_client_options() {
00029   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00030     ("thrift-broker", str()->default_value("localhost:38080"),
00031         "Thrift client endpoint in <host:port> format")
00032     ("thrift-timeout", i32()->default_value(20),
00033         "Timeout in seconds for thrift client connections")
00034     ;
00035   alias("thrift-timeout", "ThriftBroker.Timeout");
00036   // hidden aliases
00037   alias("thrift-port", "ThriftBroker.Port");
00038 }
00039 
00040 void init_thrift_client() {
00041   // prepare hidden aliases to be synced
00042   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("thrift-broker"));
00043   bool defaulted = properties->defaulted("thrift-broker");
00044   properties->set("thrift-host", e.host, defaulted);
00045   properties->set("thrift-port", e.port, !e.port || defaulted);
00046 }
00047 
00048 void init_thrift_broker_options() {
00049   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00050     ("port", i16()->default_value(38080), "Listening port")
00051     ("pidfile", str(), "File to contain the process id")
00052     ("log-api", boo()->default_value(false), "Enable or disable API logging")
00053     ;
00054   alias("port", "ThriftBroker.Port");
00055   alias("log-api", "ThriftBroker.API.Logging");
00056 }
